editorialNotes.standard: Easy to understand, quick to set up, and slick to use, you can create individual groups for your friends. Originally making its name among videogame players, these days, it’s used by everyone.
editorialNotes.short: A social network for gamers to chat in real time.

editorialNotes.standard: Connect with fellow film buffs by sharing lists, reviews, and comments–from the couch or the movie theatre lobby. If you’re serious about cinema, you’ll feel right at home.
editorialNotes.short: Share your watchlists and reviews with fellow film fans.

editorialNotes.standard: The line between instant messaging and social media is becoming a bit fuzzy—and that’s a great thing. Line offers free texting, voice messages, and video calls, all within its own nifty social network. With the app’s uncluttered, friendly interface, it’s simple to start group chats with close friends, receive notifications from celebrities you follow, or post daily highlights to your timeline. Tons of adorable virtual stickers give your messages added spark, and Line even integrates with select games and apps, letting you effortlessly share your achievements and creations.
editorialNotes.short: Update your messaging style with sticker collections designed by local creators.
